title: wind man or tentacle bish
body:
so i just recently purchased some hextech chests and rolled a {{champion:157}} shard and a {{champion:420}} shard. i can obtain one as long as i destroy the other shard.

who should i pick? the windy bronze carry lord or 1v5 pentacle bish.

replies.body: i did it, i got the windy man,bronze carrylord inbound. thanks all

yasuo, he's better.
illaoi is trash tbh. sure she got good damage, but so does every other tank. she lacks had cc though, and is only good in confined spaces.

don't become a filthy yasuo player

or an illaoi player

wait for another champion shard and reroll it into like warwick or something idk
but i wanna be a bronze carry lord
I would personally say tentacles. Much more fun to play imo :)
